# PLEASE READ ME !!!!  DO NOT COMMENT WITHOUT READING !!!

Please use this thread to post any deals you find that are **must see deals, limited time deals and deals that simply should not be missed.**

Comments on this post should be for **deals only** so that people know if this thread has new posts there is a deal to be had!

This will be very **strictly** moderated, those that cannot follow the simple idea behind it will no longer see it.

Currently this thread is visible **ONLY to logged in users**.

Providers may also post **MUST SEE** **LIMITED TIME** deals in this thread **without any regard for the over arching rule set**, providers abusing this will be politely asked to stop posting in this thread. (I have been in this game for a long time, if you think it will not be spotted you are kidding yourself)

Members may obviously post any deals they find that they believe cannot be missed as well or use it as a notification place for OVH Flash sales etc.

No affiliate links please.

It is fine to thank someone for posting a deal using the thanks button but please don't post "great offer" etc, just deals and thanks only.

If you REALLY feel you want to comment on a deal then start a new thread, if you want to discuss this thread in general use [this thread](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/8/the-cest-pit#latest "this thread")

Hit the star on the top right hand side of this post to get email notifications of updates.

All posts will be deleted once they are 7+ days old (manually at the moment so not 100% accurate)
